RU
ARTGUIDE
News site redesign
Design
January 2020
Behance

Artguide - an online resource dedicated to the cultural life of Moscow and St. Petersburg.

The main task: to change the appearance and navigation of an existing site, to make user interaction with content more simple and intuitive.

Laconic page layout in the style of minimalism emphasizes the semantic richness of the site and facilitates the perception of information.

An adaptive version was also designed, through which the site is correctly displayed on all devices.

Article page with a selection of relevant articles and a feed of the latest news.

The news page is designed as a feed and supports the overall clear style of the site.

From the upcoming events presented on the page, using filtering, the user can easily select the most suitable for himself.
